summary: Access WhatsApp API to send messages, media, or make custom API calls.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (message, media, custom API call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform (send message, send and wait for response, send template, custom API call).

parameters.name: phone number id
parameters.description: The ID of the business account's phone number from which the message will be sent.

parameters.name: recipient's phone number
parameters.description: Phone number of the recipient of the message. Include the country code.

parameters.name: message type
parameters.description: Select the type of message to send (audio, contacts, document, image, location, text, video).
